children: A vector is treated as a n×1 matrix
In case of Dense kernels: arranged as matrices
Mean is more than 2 std outside the limits in truncated_normal, so the distribution of values may be inaccurate.
Only 2-dimensional outputs are supported for sparse initialization.
For consistency, it accepts an RNG, but ignores it:
